Uses of Interface
upo.graph.Edge

    • Uses of Edge in upo.graph

      Subinterfaces of Edge in upo.graph 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DirectedEdge 
      Methods in upo.graph that return Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge Graph.addEdge(Vertex sourceVertex, Vertex targetVertex)
      Creates a new edge in this graph, going from the source vertex to the target vertex, and returns the created edge.
      Edge Graph.removeEdge(Vertex sourceVertex, Vertex targetVertex)
      Removes an edge going from source vertex to target vertex, if such vertices and such edge exist in this graph.
      Methods in upo.graph that return types with arguments of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Edge> Graph.edgeSet()
      Returns a set of the edges contained in this graph.
